file_insights.changes: Added PredictionAccuracy model with detailed accuracy tracking fields
Added methods for calculating and managing prediction accuracy

patterns_discovered: Comprehensive accuracy tracking across multiple metrics
Granular accuracy analysis by hour and day
Persistent storage of prediction performance metrics
Error calculation using standard statistical methods
gotchas_discovered: Potential performance overhead from detailed metrics calculation
Requires consistent historical data for accurate calculations
Complex error handling and data validation needed
Potential database storage requirements for detailed metrics
recommendations: Implement periodic cleanup of old accuracy records
Add more robust error handling for edge cases
Consider performance optimization for large datasets
Create visualization tools for accuracy metrics
Develop alerting system for accuracy degradation
